shortdesc.ph: A well defined content strategy ensures that all relevant information is captured in a structure that enables users to find answers to their questions as quickly as possible.

body.p: The content strategy defines document types and content elements needed for your customers and possibly internal processes. A sustainable strategy includes the process, how the information is created, from which sources and the publication timing and means.

In the workshop we will:
Define content elements, content structure, distribution and document types needed for your customers. How the information is created, from which sources, the publication timing and means is part of a sustainable strategy.
In the workshop we will use a content strategy model to cover the most important aspects of the content strategy model.
